titles.title: To educate businesses on COVID-19-based public health practices, to provide for a notice and cure period before the commencement of a private civil action, and for other purposes.
Coronavirus Public Safety and Economic Recovery Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
